update freight_formwork_mage set memb_id = #{membId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, freight_formwork_name = #{freightFormworkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supt_distrib_area_count = #{suptDistribAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, no_distrib_area_count = #{noDistribAreaCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_place = #{deliveryPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, logistics_comp_id = #{logisticsCompId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: t1.id AS id, t1.memb_id as memb_id, t1.delivery_place AS delivery_place, t1.logistics_comp_id AS logistics_comp_id, t1.freight_formwork_name AS freight_formwork_name, t1.supt_distrib_area_count AS supt_distrib_area_count, t1.no_distrib_area_count AS no_distrib_area_count, t1.create_by AS create_by, t1.create_date AS create_date, t1.update_by AS update_by, t1.update_date AS update_date, t1.remarks AS remarks, t1.del_flag AS del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM freight_formwork_mage t1 WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND t1.id = #{id}

SELECT
FROM freight_formwork_mage t1 LEFT JOIN logistics_comp_mage t2 ON t1.logistics_comp_id = t2.id WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND t2.del_flag = '0' AND t1.memb_id = #{membId}
SELECT comm_num FROM comm_pub_info WHERE freight_formwork_id = #{id} AND del_flag = '0'
